Introduction
This topic contains information on accrued lump sum for Old-Law Pension cases, including
disposition of Veterans Pension amounts under 38 CFR 3.1001 and 38 CFR 3.1007
order of preference for accrued lump sum benefits
time limitations for accrued lump sum benefits
basis for computation of accrued lump sum
change in disability and accrued lump sum
retroactive increases for accrued lump sum
, and
distinguishing between accrued lump sum and accrued under 38 CFR 3.1000
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E  - Accrued Authorization and Notification
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E
